ygData.subject: Re: Barrier Level
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats cool, I got me a bit more exp on Lvl 16 in Unrest tonight.  Was doing great, then little by little party had to log off and ended up with me and a friend
ygData.messageBody:
Thats cool, I got me a bit more exp on Lvl 16 in Unrest tonight. Was doing
great, then little by little party had to log off and ended up with me and a
friend only. But anyways I take it you mean Lvl 39 is a godsent for Clerics
cause of Rez? If so can you cast it on your own corpse and get exp back?

**************************
Azor
Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> when i die, i lose about half a bar, maybe a little more.....don't mind it
as
> much now tho....lv 39 is a godsent for clerics
>
> Azor wrote:
>
> > From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > I just can't wait to hit Lvl 19 I get some more spells and should have
> > enough money for them and still have some left over. I know I can't
wait to
> > hit Lvl 20, get my last name. I know I heard before when you hit Lvl 20
and
> > die you lose a bubble of exp, since they fixed it to where when ya die
you
> > don't lose as much exp how much do you lose now on 20 and up?
> >
> > **************************
> > Azor
> > Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> > **************************
